content: on the last dpn k4 k2tog 10 sts stitch where you left off before turning now you will work the remaining 7 stitches row 15 k4 k2tog k1 6 sts row 16 p1 p2tog twice p1 4 sts bind off 4 stitches repeat the above pattern to make the other side of the heart finishing place the purl sides of the two heart pieces together and begin stitching them together using mattress stitch stuff the piece before finishing the seam continue working in a round with the stitches on two dpns weave in the loose ends round 12 k2tog k1 k2tog twice k1 k2tog 6 sts with black embroider eyes with 2 small break the yarn leaving a tail of 15 38cm horizontal stitches placed midway up the and draw it tightly through the stitches with a heart and spaced 3 stitches apart tapestry needle to close up stuff the piece filling out the first half of the heart weave the tail down through the middle of the stitches you just closed up and reattach it to the last live stitch in the round hearts by anna hrachovec mochimochiland com 2 circular pattern continued finishing weave in the loose ends with black embroider eyes with 2 small horizontal stitches placed midway up the heart and spaced 3 stitches apart divide the 12 stitches onto 2 dpns and continue working in the round pulling the yarn tightly to join share your hearts by tagging photos with #mochimochiland find more knitted toy patterns that you ll love at mochimochiland com round 13 k4 k2tog twice k4 10 sts like + follow round 14 k2tog k1 k2tog twice k1 k2tog ravelry mochimochiland 6 sts instagram @mochimochiworld add more stuffing to the piece to fill out the facebook @mochimochiland second half of the heart giphy @mochimochiland draw the yarn tightly through the stitches with the tapestry needle use the tail to stitch up the gap at the middle of the heart with a couple stitches of mattress stitch © 2007-2020 mochimochi land llc all rights reserved hearts by anna hrachovec mochimochiland com 3
